component.name: getAvailability
component.description: Availabilty represents the periods an employee is available to be scheduled for work. This request allows you to retrieve a single employee's daily availability between two dates. In order to use it, an employee XRefCodes is needed. Employee XRefCodes can be retrieved with GET Employees REST API

component.name: getSchedules
component.description: Retrieve the configured schedules for a single employee for every day within a defined period. In order to use this request, an employee XRefCodes is needed. Employee XRefCodes can be retrieved with GET Employees REST API

component.name: getTimeAwayFromWork
component.description: Retrieve the scheduled time away from work (TAFW) periods of a single employee. In order to use this request, an employee XRefCodes is needed. Employee XRefCodes can be retrieved with GET Employees REST API

component.name: getEmployeePunches
component.description: Extract the worked shift data for several employees at a time. Required parameters for the call include FilterTransactionStartTimeUTC and FilterTransactionEndTimeUTC. The system will search for all employee punch records that were modified between these two dates. The two dates must be 7 days apart or less. REST API

component.name: getEmployeeRawPunches
component.description: Retrieve raw punches as they are entered at the clock REST API

component.name: postEmployeeRawPunches
component.description: Insert a raw punch. This raw punch record will be treated as a punch coming from the clock and be validated against configured punch policies REST API
